item.description:
INTERMEDIATE I



When should I use lo, la, le, los, las, les?
Pronombres de objeto directo e indirecto



This 2-hour Intermediate I highly interactive workshop will help you :

  • Distinguish between the Indirect and Direct Object
  • Talk about the best translation for "it, her, him"
  • Talk about the best translation for "them"
  • Use direct and indirect object pronouns in exercises and informal conversation



Requirements to sign up for this seminar include :

  • currently being able to orally express yourself using simple present, past and future tenses.
  • having been placed at the intermediate level at high school, college and/or a language school
  • still having difficulties using direct and indirect object
  • not having working knowledge of the topics to be covered on this seminar




This Intermediate I Spanish Workshop will be conducted by Guilianna, Spanish tutor at Spanish Black Belt, leading Spanish language school servicing Boston MA.

This workshop is not free. Cost per person for this 2-hour-long workshop is $19.- Only 6 persons are allowed per workshop so please sign up on-line through our secure Meetup page quickly enough to secure a seat. Payment will not be accepted at the door. Refunds can be granted ONLY if requested 5 days prior to the workshop's assigned date.





If you cannot make it to this workshop, or would prefer to attend a more regular class, please click here to access all Small Group sessions currently being offered by Spanish Black Belt.
item.name: Intermediate I Workshop: When should I use lo, la, le, los, las, les?
